text:
Well... Producer-san...
I was just looking at bed covers...

I like how this one looks,
but I'm not sure about the texture...

I don't want to compromise on the feel of my bedding...!
I wish I could check it out in a store...

I see. So, the product you're looking at...
isn't available in stores?

I see.
Can I take a look?

Right... This store might carry it.
It's not too far by train.

Wow...
You really are something, Producer-san.
